rules_text:
When Leviathan, Heart of Sin enters the battlefield, journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven’t already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
Unless you’ve journeyed into the Underworld seven or more times, Leviathan is an artifact and isn’t a creature. Otherwise, it has flying, indestructible, and “Leviathan’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of times you’ve journeyed into the Underworld.”
